argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | seqabs.1 | |- ( ph -> N e. ( ZZ>= ` M ) ) |
| 2 |  | seqabs.2 | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. ( M ... N ) ) -> ( F ` k ) e. CC ) |
| 3 |  | seqabs.3 | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. ( M ... N ) ) -> ( G ` k ) = ( abs ` ( F ` k ) ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_fzfid | |- ( ph -> ( M ... N ) e. Fin ) |
| 5 | 4, 2 | #P_fsumabs | |- ( ph -> ( abs ` sum_ k e. ( M ... N ) ( F ` k ) ) <_ sum_ k e. ( M ... N ) ( abs ` ( F ` k ) ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_eqidd | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. ( M ... N ) ) -> ( F ` k ) = ( F ` k ) ) |
| 7 | 6, 1, 2 | #P_fsumser | |- ( ph -> sum_ k e. ( M ... N ) ( F ` k ) = ( seq M ( + , F ) ` N ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( ph -> ( abs ` sum_ k e. ( M ... N ) ( F ` k ) ) = ( abs ` ( seq M ( + , F ) ` N ) ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_abscl | |- ( ( F ` k ) e. CC -> ( abs ` ( F ` k ) ) e. RR ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_recnd | |- ( ( F ` k ) e. CC -> ( abs ` ( F ` k ) ) e. CC ) |
| 11 | 2, 10 | #P_syl | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. ( M ... N ) ) -> ( abs ` ( F ` k ) ) e. CC ) |
| 12 | 3, 1, 11 | #P_fsumser | |- ( ph -> sum_ k e. ( M ... N ) ( abs ` ( F ` k ) ) = ( seq M ( + , G ) ` N ) ) |
| 13 | 5, 8, 12 | #P_3brtr3d | |- ( ph -> ( abs ` ( seq M ( + , F ) ` N ) ) <_ ( seq M ( + , G ) ` N ) ) |
